page.title: 05Housing in Belsay
page.content: There are 31 houses in this block. Of these 10 are farmhouses, 14 are farm workers cottages, 5 are part of Belsay village and 2 are private dwellings in the country. Only two new bungalows have been built in this block since 1960. Only 1 house does not have a bathroom with bath and or shower and hot and cold water with either integral or separarte W.C. The average house has 6 rooms and is occupied by 3 persons. All but the two "new bungalows" are stone contruction with either stone or blue slate roofs. All have flower and vegetable gardens. Cooking fuel:_electricity or oil. Heating fuel:_ coal, electric, oil, wood. Calor gas and coke are also used.
